testimonials.quote: This book is truly amazing. The story is filled with mystery, drawing you in, allowing you to connect deeply with each individual as they evolve throughout the story. The main character is excellent also, and the author keeps you engaged in every chapter. I really love the book! Great work!
testimonials.author: Nedjyna Hyppolite

testimonials.quote: "Oh my universe" - This debut novel sets a wide stage for what is sure to be a jam packed series full of heart and adventure. The story focuses on layering a solid foundation, that establishes a rich and textured lore, whilst giving you a heartfelt story told from an alien perspective. It's unique and interesting to experience our planet from an otherworldly perspective.
testimonials.author: Allan Parry
